## BaseError class

Base class for typed errors, adding nested errors (causes) to the stack.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BaseError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(message, nested)](./noicejs.baseerror._constructor_.md) |  | Create a new typed error. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cause](./noicejs.baseerror.cause.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Error \| undefined | Get the cause of this error: the first nested error. |
|  [length](./noicejs.baseerror.length.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Get the number of nested errors. |
|  [message](./noicejs.baseerror.message.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string |  |
|  [nested](./noicejs.baseerror.nested.md) | <code>protected</code> | Array&lt;Error&gt; |  |
|  [stack?](./noicejs.baseerror.stack.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
